about.heading: About me
about.3: , I embarked on my journey as asoftware engineer. Throughout my career, I've cultivated a deep interest in roles that seamlessly integrate cloud technology. Having achieved the
about.5: certification I am driven to amplify my expertise through purposeful projects. I am currently on the lookout for a position as a Java software engineer, where I already have 2 years of experience, with the possibility of learning and advancing towards roles such as Solutions Architect or Cloud Engineer.

projectsData.heading: My Projects
projectsData.Cloud Portfolio: I created a portfolio website using multiple AWS services as well as an IaC approach with Terraform.
projectsData.Book Store: I created a Bookstore application using Spring Boot.
projectsData.SleepZzone: I created a complete Web Application Solution for a SleepTech Startup using the FERN Stack.

experiencesData.heading: My Experience
experiencesData.CTO: Led the strategic management and orchestrated the development and maintenance of robust cloud infrastructures of a dynamic SleepTech startup.
experiencesData.Software Engineer: Development of features for multiple clients. These projects where based in Java using the Spring framework.
experiencesData.Full-Stack Developer: Development and improvement of Drupal modules using PHP as the back-end language as well as JS, HTML5 and CSS/SCSS for the front-end.
experiencesData.Back-End Developer: Development of several applications using Java with Spring, mongoDB and MySQL.
experiencesData.Software Developer: Development and implementation of Java software in the following functional areas: e-health, security, education, mobility, etc.
